elements.description:
`simple-toolbar-button`
a button for rich text editor (custom buttons can extend this)

### Styling

`<simple-toolbar-button>` provides following custom properties and mixins
for styling:

Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
--simple-toolbar-button-height | button height | 24px
--simple-toolbar-button-flex | flex for button in a toolbar | 0 0 auto
--simple-toolbar-button-min-width | button min-width | --simple-toolbar-button-height
--simple-toolbar-button-padding | button padding | 0
--simple-toolbar-button-opacity | button opacity | 1
--simple-toolbar-button-color | button text color | unset
--simple-toolbar-button-bg | button background color | transparent
--simple-toolbar-button-border-color | button border color | --simple-toolbar-border-color
--simple-toolbar-button-border-width | button border width | --simple-toolbar-border-width
--simple-toolbar-button-border-radius | button border radius | 3px
--simple-toolbar-button-toggled-opacity | button opacity when toggled | 0.8
--simple-toolbar-button-toggled-color | button text color when toggled | unset
--simple-toolbar-button-toggled-bg | button background color when toggled | unset
--simple-toolbar-button-toggled-border-color | button border color when toggled | unset
--simple-toolbar-button-hover-opacity | button opacity when hovered | 0.8
--simple-toolbar-button-hover-color | button text color when hovered | unset
--simple-toolbar-button-hover-bg | button background color when hovered | unset
--simple-toolbar-button-hover-border-color | button border color when hovered | unset
--simple-toolbar-button-disabled-opacity | button opacity when disabled | 0.5
--simple-toolbar-button-disabled-color | button text color when disabled | unset
--simple-toolbar-button-disabled-bg | button background color when disabled | unset
--simple-toolbar-button-disabled-border-color | button border color when disabled | unset
elements.name: SimpleToolbarButton

`simple-toolbar-button-group`
a button for rich text editor (custom buttons can extend this)

properties.name: __allowNull
properties.description: allows no item to be selected

properties.name: __query
properties.description: query selector for slotted children, can be overridden

elements.name: SimpleToolbarButtonGroup

elements.description:
`simple-toolbar`
a customizable toolbar

### Styling

`<simple-toolbar>` provides following custom properties and mixins
for styling:

Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
--simple-toolbar-border-color | default border color | transparent
--simple-toolbar-border-width | default border width | 1px
--simple-toolbar-group-border-color | border color for button groups | --simple-toolbar-border-color
--simple-toolbar-group-border-width | border width for button groups | --simple-toolbar-border-width
--simple-toolbar-group-padding | padding for button groups | 0 3px
elements.name: SimpleToolbar

elements.description:
`simple-toolbar`
a customizable toolbar

### Styling

`<simple-toolbar>` provides following custom properties and mixins
for styling:

Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
--simple-toolbar-border-color | default border color | transparent
--simple-toolbar-border-width | default border width | 1px
--simple-toolbar-group-border-color | border color for button groups | --simple-toolbar-border-color
--simple-toolbar-group-border-width | border width for button groups | --simple-toolbar-border-width
--simple-toolbar-group-padding | padding for button groups | 0 3px

properties.name: currentLabel

properties.description: current label based on toggled state

properties.description: is visible label is needed or specified

properties.description: template for inner part of button (label and icon) in order specified

properties.description: template for button, based on whether or not the button toggles

methods.name: connectedCallback
methods.description:
Called every time the element is inserted into the DOM. Useful for
running setup code, such as fetching resources or rendering.
Generally, you should try to delay work until this time.

methods.name: disconnectedCallback
methods.description: life cycle, element is detatched

methods.name: focus
methods.description: sets focus to button

methods.name: _defaultOrToggled
methods.description: updates a button value based on whether or not button is toggled

return.desc:
the correct value based on
whether or not the button is toggled

methods.name: _handleClick
methods.description: handles button click

methods.name: _handleBlur
methods.description: handles blur

methods.name: _handleFocus
methods.description: handles focus

methods.name: _handleKeydown
methods.description: handles keydown

methods.name: _handleKeys
methods.description: handles keypress

methods.name: _handleShortcutKeys
methods.description: customizable event for when shortcut keys are pressed

methods.name: updateButtonRegistry
methods.description: updates toolbar buttonregistry as needed

methods.name: _uniqueText
methods.description: checks to see if a string is unique and not empty

methods.name: render
methods.description: render function for template

methods.name: connectedCallback
methods.description:
Called every time the element is inserted into the DOM. Useful for
running setup code, such as fetching resources or rendering.
Generally, you should try to delay work until this time.

methods.name: disconnectedCallback
methods.description:
Called every time the element is removed from the DOM. Useful for
running clean up code (removing event listeners, etc.).

methods.name: addButton
methods.description: adds a button to a div

params.name: config
params.description: object containing configuration for a button

params.name: div
params.description: element that acts as a button group

methods.name: addButtonGroup
methods.description: adds a group of buttons to a parent container

params.name: config
params.description: object containing configuration for a group of buttons

return.desc: div element as a button group

methods.name: clearToolbar
methods.description: empties toolbar and registered buttons

methods.name: deregisterButton
methods.description: removes registered button when moved/removed

methods.name: registerButton
methods.description: registers button when appended

methods.name: resizeToolbar
methods.description: resizes toolbar based on element positions

methods.name: getItemIndex
methods.description: gets button's index in main menu

methods.name: getItem
methods.description: gets previous or next item based on offset

methods.name: setCurrentItem
methods.description: sets current item

methods.name: focusOn
methods.description: focuses on an item

methods.name: updateButton
methods.description: updates registered button, it needed

methods.name: updateToolbar
methods.description: updates buttons based on change in config

methods.name: _addConfigItems
methods.description: loops through config to add items

methods.name: _handleKeydown
methods.description:
handles keydown events, as prescribed in
{@link https://www.w3.org/TR/wai-aria-practices/examples/toolbar/toolbar.html}

methods.name: _handleFocusChange
methods.description: handles focus changes and determines if toolbar still has focus;

methods.name: _handleButtonRegister
methods.description: handles appended button

methods.name: _handleButtonDeregister
methods.description: handles moved/removed button

methods.name: _handleButtonUpdate
methods.description: handles updated button

methods.name: _handleResize
methods.description: resizes toolbar on window resize

methods.name: _handleShortcutKeys
methods.description: handles shortcut keys for buttons

methods.name: _renderButton
methods.description: creates a button element based on config object

methods.name: _renderButtonGroup
methods.description: creates a div element to contain/group buttons based on config object

params.name: config
params.description: object containing configuration for a group of buttons

return.desc: div element as a button group

methods.name: _shortcutKeysMatch
methods.description: determines if a keyup event matches a shortcut

methods.description:
can be overridden when extending this button,
so that certain elements in menuitems are excluded from keyboard handling

methods.name: _handleFocus
methods.description: handles when menu has focus

methods.name: _handleBlur
methods.description: handles when menu loses focus

methods.name: addItem
methods.description: adds a menuitem to lists and sets up its listeners

methods.name: removeItem
methods.description: removes a menuitem's listners and menuitem istelf from list
